title: Site / Brand Name
description: Used in the dashboard and within email templates.

title: Logo
description: Used in the dashboard and within email templates as required.

title: Reverse Logo
description: Used in the dashboard and within email templates as required.

title: Dashboard URL
description: The URL for the dashboard.  This is used in email templates

title: Help and Support URL
description: The URL for any help and support documentation.  This is used in email templates if supplied

title: Terms URL
description: The URL for any terms and conditions.  This is used in email templates if supplied

title: Reset Password URL
description: The URL for password resets.  This is for inclusion in password reset emails.

title: User Invitation URL
description: The URL where users are redirected when they click on an invitation link.

title: Reply to Address
description: The default reply to address for all email correspondence

title: From Address
description: The default from address for all email correspondence

title: Referring Domains
description: Your website and dashboard domain names which allow us to authenticate your users for whitelabel access
